title: Instructional Design for Enhancing Cognitive Achievement and Technological Presence in [K-12] Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Operations and Understanding of Secondary Education Curriculum Content
context.additional_context: An online course strengthening instructional design competencies for social studies integration, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their cognitive achievement levels by 20% or more through analysis of online interaction participation.
Learners can design learning environments using tools that measure technological presence (connectivity/availability awareness).
Learners can implement and evaluate Computer-Mediated Communication (CMC)-based interaction strategies at least three times in PBL projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
